thread.title: DLF Down 3% On Reports That SEBI Moves SC Against Asset Monetization
thread.title_full: DLF Down 3% On Reports That SEBI Moves SC Against Asset Monetization

title: DLF Down 3% On Reports That SEBI Moves SC Against Asset Monetization
text:
NSE 129.85 4.7 (-3.49%) The newspaper reported that SEBI has moved the Supreme Court, seeking a restraint order on the plans of realty major DLF to monetise its rental properties. The court has admitted the application and listed it for hearing on October 30.
The shares were last trading lower by 2.5 per cent in the Bombay Stock Exchange. 
In Oct last year, SEBI passed an order barring the company and its executives from the capital markets. Earlier in Feb this year, SEBI imposed a fine on the company. 
GoodReturns.in
